if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("fly") && (player.getRights() == 7)) { if (player.playerStandIndex != 1501) { player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(1500)); player.StandIndex = 1501; player.TurnIndex = 1851; player.WalkIndex = 1851; player.Turn180Index = 1851; player.Turn90playerWIndex = 1501; player.Turn90playerplayerWIndex = 1501; player.RunIndex = 1851; player.updateRequired = true; player.appearanplayereUpdateRequired = true; player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Are Now Flying!."); } else { player.StandIndex = 0x328; player.TurnIndex = 0x337; player.WalkIndex = 0x333; player.Turn180Index = 0x334; player.Turn90playerWIndex = 0x335; player.Turn90playerplayerWIndex = 0x336; player.RunIndex = 0x338; player.updateRequired = true; player.appearanplayereUpdateRequired = true; player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You Have Stopped Flying."); } }
